short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finexo Login Tool allow to login into client's accounts on various portal like GST, Income Tax, and TRACES

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto-sync between multiple computers.

You have to subscribe to Finexo Login Tool to use this extension. You can sign up from this link - https://logintool.finexo.in/signup

Finexo Login Tool can be uses to login in client's account.

After installing this extension, you will get a small popup on login pages of GST, Income Tax and Traces portals. You just need to select the client and the client's username and password will be auto-filled, if added in Finexo Login Tool. So, you need not type it every time.
